p: Three items adapted from the Unidimensional Relationship Closeness Scale [ 62] were used to assess how close participants were to their sex and drug-injecting partner(s). Items included, How close are you to your sex (drug-injecting) partners, How important are your sex (drug-injecting) partners, and How often do you see your sex (drug-injecting) partners. Responses were given on a four-point Likert-type scale. Preliminary analyses suggested that the items were reliable (sex partners, α = 0.82; drug-injecting partners, α = 0.74). Composite scores were created to indicate relationship closeness, with higher scores indicating greater closeness.
